org.kitteh.irc.client.library.feature.sending

Interface MessageSendingQueue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueueProcessingThreadSender, SingleDelaySender

    public interface MessageSendingQueue
    A queue for sending messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void beginSending(Consumer<String> consumer)
      Starts sending messages to the given consumer.
      boolean contains(String message)
      Gets if the queue currently has within it a particular message.
      Optional<Consumer<String>> getConsumer()
      Gets the queue's currently set consumer.
      void pause()
      Pauses message sending.
      void queue(String message)
      Queues a given message.
      Queue<String> shutdown()
      Closes down shop, interrupts all threads.

    • Method Detail

      • beginSending

        void beginSending(@Nonnull
                  Consumer<String> consumer)
        Starts sending messages to the given consumer.
        Parameters:
        consumer - the consumer to consume

      • contains

        boolean contains(@Nonnull
                 String message)
        Gets if the queue currently has within it a particular message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to check for
        Returns:
        true if the message is not yet sent

      • getConsumer

        @Nonnull
Optional<Consumer<String>> getConsumer()
        Gets the queue's currently set consumer.
        Returns:
        current consumer if present

      • pause

        void pause()
        Pauses message sending.

      • queue

        void queue(@Nonnull
           String message)
        Queues a given message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to queue

      • shutdown

        @Nonnull
Queue<String> shutdown()
        Closes down shop, interrupts all threads. No further messages.
        Returns:
        the remaining messages
